website_summaries.verdict: Interesting design that goes well beyond the standard hitting tee.
pros: Base has 5 posts positions, allowing you to work on hitting in different contact zones
Works great for advanced hitting drills for experienced players
Lightweight and comes apart for easy transport
cons: Design is more extensive than what young players need

customer_reviews.title: Wow, what a tee!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most solid tee I've ever seen. I have to believe I will have this for my grandchildren if they play ball. Vey easily adjustable. It's pretty heavy so if the tee is hit it shouldn't tip it over. There are several tee positions to practice hitting inside, outside and down the middle at just about every possible height you will need to practice. There's a scan code apparently for drills, but our instructor gives my daughter what to work on. I could easily see this as a durable team practice tee. It was worth the extra money over the less durable tees.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Really solid product
customer_reviews.text: Great tee. Heavy so it isn’t tipping over every time you hit the tee with the bat. Comes with two tees and multiple slots to place them (so you can simulate inside pitches, outside pitches, etc.). The two sees are adjustable so you can simulate high or low pitches ... or just adjust to your ballplayer’s height. Seems really well made and solid. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: stephen sommers

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable height and plate locations help young kids learn the strike zone
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. We are done with baseball and the tee held up great to 12+ kids smacking it around for 3 months. The different pitch locations are great, and the adjustable height helps kids learn the strike zone. Solid rubber construction, and the handle and straps make it easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: Court Harris

customer_reviews.title: It is great
customer_reviews.text: My youngest grandson started to play T-Ball this year and it has help to teach him how to stand and to keep his eye on the ball. My oldest grandson is in his 4th year of base ball and I am teaching him how to hit the inside and outside pitches. It helps to teach him to keep his head down. We use the 5-Point Hitting Tee Drill Book, that you can down load on line, for drills to help him to be a better hitter.
customer_reviews.author: Viewfinder12

customer_reviews.title: Man, I love this tee
customer_reviews.text: I am playing my first season of adult baseball in 30 years. I've coached my son in past years and purchased the cheapo batting tees that just don't hold up and don't extend high enough for taller boys (or adults). This tee is very sturdy. I've used it just once, but I am certain the tee tubes will last and last. The tubes extend very high in the strike zone for me and I am 6'0. It comes with a drills instruction manual that is very useful. Don't waste your money on the cheap tees. For the price this tee is a great value!
customer_reviews.author: MikeNearChiTown

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great to use in teaching batters how to hit the ball inside or out without adjusting their stance. Teaches how to properly use bat/swing path
customer_reviews.author: Danny and Isaiah

customer_reviews.title: Real heavy duty product
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty product, my son is a serious baseball player and we go thru a lot of tee's because if you use it you break it. This is a great product that is built to last. Jugs makes products for serious players and if you have more than 1 kid and want to hand it down this would be the product. Every serious baseball player should have a 5 point Tee, this product improved my sons hitting.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas D. Dunne

customer_reviews.title: Durable &sturdy
customer_reviews.text: All my son wanted for his 17th birthday was the jugs pop up screen and hitting tee so that he could practice baseball any day, anytime, anywhere he wanted. He wants to play baseball professionally and practices with his portable screen and tee non stop. This is the indoor practice equipment they use at his high school, and it has withstood the test there, so we already knew what a great product this was. The jugs batting tee has allowed him to position the ball at different points so that he can practice batting in the direction he wants the ball to go, like inside, outside, straight ahead. This is definitely great for all players at any age/ level!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina "Mz Charmed"

customer_reviews.text: When used for adult softball batting practice, you need to set the tee on a 5 gallon bucket for accurate height. Overall construction is excellent. I bought 2. One for personal use and one for adult senior softball batting instruction use. 14 months and hundreds of teed balls later, they both a like new. A quality purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TMac

customer_reviews.title: This batting tee is both durable and effective
customer_reviews.text: This is the first batting tee that I can say meets all the criteria for batting tee drills. It's made really well, durable and can take a lot of abuse. Highly recommend the Jugs 5-Point Hitting Tee as a teaching and instruction tool, starting with 12 yr. olds through 19 yr. olds. All the drill position instructions that come with the tee are also a great teaching tool.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, well built and a must buy tee for all ages.
customer_reviews.text: Solid solid solid!! What a great product! I've bought 4 different brands of tees to help my son and the team I coach be better hitters and all others have only lasted a few sessions and broke. With this tee I feel confident that it will last for years to come. The only parts that might wear out eventually would be the straps that hold the tee tubes but not too concerned about it. Overall if your looking for a tee that is going to last you over 10 years don't pass this up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you are into doing drills this item is awesome. It is heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: If you are into doing drills this item is awesome. It is heavy duty. I coached kids from 10U - 18U and the tee still good. There are no tears or wear points.
customer_reviews.author: Idk

customer_reviews.title: The BEST TEE ever
customer_reviews.text: This is perhaps the best batting tee I've ever seen. It is durable, strong and easy for me to carry. With the duel tees we can do the double hitting practice. We can also work on the different positions for hitting (inside, outside, down the middle). At $65 it was a fair price for what you get
customer_reviews.author: Wayne J. Street Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good hitting tea
customer_reviews.text: My kid is on his his high school varsity team / thinks that this hitting tee is great - second one he has bought in the past 4 years --- that's what happens when you leave the tee out 24/7
customer_reviews.author: charles j.

customer_reviews.title: More Money....but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: If you think your kid is going to stick with baseball for more than a couple of years, this is a very worthy investment. We purchased a different version from a different manufacturer a couple of years ago, but it was made of a much thinner and more rigid plastic which doesn't flex. It fell apart after less than one baseball season of hitting. Hitting off the T is likely one of the more important fundamental exercises for players of all ages and so far, this is the best T I've seen on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Gray

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much indistructable. Adjustable for height and placement in the batting box. Worked for girls I coached from 11 years to 16 years. Lots of uTube videos available to show you how to use this Tee to improve your team's swings and hitting.
customer_reviews.author: R. Krueger

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you want
customer_reviews.text: This tee is extremely sturdy and is made of thick, heavy rubber that will last for a long time. You couldn't tip it over if you tried. It is heavy to carry but it does have a handle and will definitely take a beating.
customer_reviews.author: Pheenix11

customer_reviews.title: Look no further.....
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this product. He hits at least a bucket of balls a day. Never a problem, practically indestructible. If you want a no frills, long lasting, quality built piece of equipment for your son or daughter.... Look no further
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: I've already suffered thru a couple "heavy duty" batting tees that fell apart pretty quick so I'm always skeptical shopping for another. This one has a very rubbery heavy duty feel. The top feels as tough as any other I've used. The only slight concern is that the top pulls up and pushes down very easy, it feels as though it's going to just start slipping on it's own pretty soon. No big deal though, I'll just put a layer of duct tape around it and that will give the resistance to keep it from slipping. BTW, style is great, but that's all pretty clear in the pic so no need for me to give my opinion on that.
customer_reviews.author: JustMe

customer_reviews.title: Jugs Hitting Tee
customer_reviews.text: Tee is made of great quality material. Excellent tee to purchase. Highly recommend to any player or coach. Love the point different hitting points and the extra piece that normally is the first to break.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald M.

customer_reviews.title: This is what you've been looking for
customer_reviews.text: After breaking other hitting tees from the department store I started doing some research and ended up with this product. Wow, you will not break this thing. It really is heavy duty. Made from that thick, smelly rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Samson

customer_reviews.title: Best tee
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tee I've ever owned. I've coached many many seasons at this point. I've gone through several tees. I can already tell if I had purchased this tee years ago, I would not have had to buy any other tees.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Tee
customer_reviews.text: Defenitely a winner in the durability department this jugs 5-poing tee has kept me busy and can take a beating did I mention how heavy it is probably due to the type of rubber makes for a longer use with no problems..
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Jugs 5-Point Hitting Tee
customer_reviews.text: My girl's softball teams have beat the heck out of this thing during the season and it is holding up very well. This has been a great asset for teaching the girls how to hit. Very good quality and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. O

customer_reviews.title: works as described and bullet tough
customer_reviews.text: purchased from the warehouse and saved 10 dollars which is nice given this item is made for beating up and after a few days looks like it just came out of the box. This shows the quality of the item, strong, strong and strong! love that it has two stands.
customer_reviews.author: AI

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tee
customer_reviews.text: Very durable tee made of quality materials. Awesome to have the 5 points to hit from different locations of the plate by just moving the tube. It's better than moving the whole tee to different locations of home plate and the youth player gets a better understanding of hitting the different pitch locations with home plate not moving around and only the tube (aka, the balls location). Also some really good drills to do with both tubes in place. Breaks down nicely and easy to transport. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Neiman

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, 2 tees included. Worth the extra ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, 2 tees included. Worth the extra $$ for a product that will outlast others.
customer_reviews.author: Stones

customer_reviews.title: Solid product with good quality.
customer_reviews.text: First bought a cheap one ($15), had to return after the 1st practise. This Tee is wonderful and can practise pitch at different location.
customer_reviews.author: truetrader

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 kids all different ages and differing sizes. This was a wonderful investment for our "mini ball team!" They are doing various suggested exercises. GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: 7 Hands

customer_reviews.title: Helps my son hit.
customer_reviews.text: My son used this at baseball camp, and it was a great help to his hitting. We wanted our own and have not been disappointed. He can use it on his own.
customer_reviews.author: Doris

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this buy
customer_reviews.text: Quality tee. Heavy duty. Very flexible with the 5 hitting positions. I am very happy with this buy.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Rio

customer_reviews.title: Isn't flimsy like some I've purchased at the local sporting goods store
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction. Isn't flimsy like some I've purchased at the local sporting goods store. Worth the money on this one! Arrived on time. No damage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This batters tee is very sturdy. Bought this tee for my daughter to practice for her first t-ball season and ended up having to use it for the whole team. Very durable so far.
customer_reviews.author: Nike21

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Premium product. We are very pleased. Extremely durable. You are able to move the tee around and also raise and lower the height.
customer_reviews.author: lukey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tee sturdy and allows for very cool inside out drills
customer_reviews.author: Aberserker

customer_reviews.title: Jugs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 16 year old son,he is also teaching his nephews to hit better with the practice that they are now able to get.
customer_reviews.author: CAM

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best one I've ever seen or felt. We just started using it but I'm certain we are going to be very pleased
customer_reviews.author: WSW

customer_reviews.title: Jugs Hitting Tee
customer_reviews.text: So Far, so good with the 5 point hitting tee. Would have expected a higher elevation, however.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Lewis

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Although maybe we went a little overboard purchasing this for a bantam level team, I expect us to get many, many years of use from this outstanding tee ( I have three young girls of my own.) It is made from solid rubber so it is very sturdy and the multiple hitting positions are great for teaching the girls to hit inside and outside pitches. It is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Travel softball coach

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty Hitting Tee
customer_reviews.text: I tried out the Jugs 5-point hitting tee this past weekend. The tee is made of heavy duty rubber. It weighs well over 10lbs. I had my kids try it out and it was great.
customer_reviews.author: M. Carrion

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: A good and sturdy tee as well made as any on the market. For the price differential we made the right decision.
customer_reviews.author: john morris

customer_reviews.title: Optional Positions Are A Benefit
customer_reviews.text: Love all the optional positions with this tee. Great for a single man work out.
customer_reviews.author: J Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tee
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and exactly as described. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: J. DoubleU

customer_reviews.title: batting is fun
customer_reviews.text: Hoo-Ra this batting tee is very good; all of the pitch locations can be worked on. It's a joy to watch the kids get their first base hit.
customer_reviews.author: Hughey M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: seemes to be worth the price. will update later on wear
customer_reviews.author: keith holbrooks

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: Great aid for helping all ages won't break and will never grow out of it. Best tee out their hands down
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought the T for my 6 year old works great very durable should last for years
customer_reviews.author: William Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Softball Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Jugs makes a superior product. I am a Coach of a traveling softball team, and this product allows us to work on all types of swing planes to accentuate our girls batting. Amazon is a great purveyor, and I will continue to purchase from them.
customer_reviews.author: PeterC

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: We have had other tees and this one is made very well and doesn't smell like molded plastic! Very happy with the purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Sturdy weighted base make a huge difference. Carrying handle is nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for learning proper technique
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for kids to learn how to hit inside and outside pitches
customer_reviews.author: Scott Stasak

customer_reviews.title: Great Tee
customer_reviews.text: Tee is very durable. I leave this Tee outside in my batting cage and it is exposed to all the elements. Longest lasting Tee I have ever owned
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Costello

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This gives my daughter various ways to practice her hitting and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Crump

customer_reviews.title: review of jugs 5-point hitting tee
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. The price is pretty high, but the product is made well and is very versatile. It is great to use when teaching how to hit to the opposite field.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Koetters

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this tee! He got it for his 10th birthday. Its easy for him to move the tee and he's able to do all the drills they do at practice!
customer_reviews.author: T. Janssen

customer_reviews.title: Jugs T good quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality product for the price. A good value. I have 2 and they hold up to teenage player abuse well.
customer_reviews.author: Allister McaKinnon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable... we have owned many batting t's and this is by FAR the best! We will recommend it for sure!
customer_reviews.author: My2boys1girl

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my daughters softball, using all the different points of the tee practices great skill. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: lois

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Very happy with the tee my boys love it
customer_reviews.author: Don Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: This tee is great for working on hitting the inside and outside pitch. It is also very sturdy and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: hernanr34

customer_reviews.title: We love it.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Well worth the money. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Curry

customer_reviews.title: Good, sturdy hitting tee
customer_reviews.text: This is one stinky hitting tee and plate, but is very sturdy. I like how the two tees can be used together to reinforce training on swing planes, but generally use it just to give guys some swings into the net at different points on the plate.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Wenger

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and strong
customer_reviews.text: Been hitting off this tee pretty much every day for the last three weeks. It's super sturdy and has a great weight to it. It might not be the best choice if you are going to lug it around a lot, but it's great for the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dimples

customer_reviews.title: Great Hitting tee
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old son loves this. The two bars allow good versatility in batting drills. Sturdy construction to withstand abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Jim M.

customer_reviews.title: JUGS products are no longer great quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter plays on a 14U travel team, and her coach has an older tee like this one. It's truly sad how the newer products today sacrifice quality in order to make a buck. I would not buy this tee again. It's better than many other tees, but I would have spent a little more for another product if I had known JUGS was willing to cut corners. I didn't look but I'm sure it's another discount product made in China! Charge me $10 more and make a quality product in the USA!! I'll willing to pay for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: FORSAN

customer_reviews.title: to soft of rubber
customer_reviews.text: Really flimsy. Rubber wear ball sits is way to soft. If you raise it up to just below the chest of an 11year old the thing bends real bad and the ball falls off. The point of this tee is multi locations around the strike zone. Hieght is a spot also.
customer_reviews.author: Boss of the Stix

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: does the job, a bit low for softball, put it on a can and get the right height
customer_reviews.author: Jay W Paulsen

customer_reviews.title: The right one!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy material that appears to be very durable...compact when broken down for easy transporting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well Built does not fall over when ball is miss hit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Jugs 5-Point Hitting Tee
product_meta.description:
An advanced Hitting Tee that helps you teach how to hit the ball where it is pitched.

AMAZON.COM




Tees in five different positions help players train for various pitch locations. This unique hitting tee helps baseball and softball players learn how to hit the ball at different locations over the plate, improving hitting fundamentals. A heavyweight solid rubber base provides a stable platform to hit from, while two fully adjustable telescoping extension tubes allow use by players of different sizes. The tee includes a 20-page 5-Point Hitting Tee Drill Book with detailed, step-by-step instructions on proper use, and a patented Grip-n-Go handle. Disassembles for easy storage when not in use.  Features


 * Develops hand-eye coordination and a quick bat 
 * Teaches correct hitting fundamentals 
 * Learn proper contact points for inside, middle, and outside pitches 
 * Comes with two adjustable extension tubes 
 * Lightweight unit breaks down for easy transport 
 * Patented Grip-n-Go handle 
 * Comes complete with 20-page 5-Point Hitting Tee Drill Book 

 About JUGS
JUGS makes the bestselling pitching machine in the world, and is also the leading producer of popular baseball training aids like batting cages, protective nets, balls, and more.
feature_bullets: 2D Barcode located on base of tee links to video drills highlighting  the proper way to use the tee along with challenging drills for the  advanced player
Light-weight and breaks down for easy transport
Develops hand-eye coordination and a quick bat
Teaches the hitter to use the whole field
Teaches correct contact points for inside, middle, and outside pitches
Patented Grip-n-Go handle for easy transport

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
